title: Schindelhauer Wilhelm CCLII shifts to world record 252-speed in special edition city bike
content:
Schindelhauer takes commuter bikes to the next level (and maybe one beyond that) with a new special edition Wilhelm CCLII 252-speed, internally-geared city commuter bike. With their signature clean lines & low maintenance, the Gates belt drive powered drivetrain delivers a whopping 3350% gear ratio, perfect for climbing hills in the steepest cities in the […]

The post Schindelhauer Wilhelm CCLII shifts to world record 252-speed in special edition city bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
